trans-unit.source: Provides a custom <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" /> to use for grouping properties that are displayed in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" />.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona un objeto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" /> personalizado que se usa para agrupar las propiedades mostradas en un control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry" /> instance that is checked to determine whether it is included among those properties edited by the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" />.
trans-unit.target: La instancia de <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry" /> que se comprueba para determinar si est√° incluida entre las propiedades editadas por el objeto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" />.

trans-unit.source: Determines which properties are edited by the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina las propiedades que edita el objeto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this editor edits the specified property; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si este editor modifica la propiedad especificada; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuevo atributo <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" /> para el objeto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" /> for which to create a new <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: La instancia de <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" /> para la que se va a crear un nuevo objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuevo atributo <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" /> para el objeto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: Un nuevo objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" /> type for which to create the new <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: El tipo <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" /> a partir del cual debe crearse la clase <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" /> nueva.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" /> type.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuevo atributo <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" /> para el tipo <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: Un nuevo objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> that is hosted by the property inspector to provide the user interface for a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene una instancia de <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> hospedada por el inspector de propiedad para proporcionar la interfaz de usuario para un objeto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> user interface.
trans-unit.target: Interfaz de usuario <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" />.

trans-unit.source: The desired <see cref="T.Systems.Windows.Size" /> of the image to return.
trans-unit.target: El objeto <see cref="T.Systems.Windows.Size" /> deseado de la imagen que se va a devolver.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that the host can display in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl" />.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve una instancia de <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que el host puede mostrar en un objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to display in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl" />.
trans-unit.target: Instancia de <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que se va a mostrar en el control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a localized string that indicates to which category the editor belongs.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene una cadena traducida que indica la categor√≠a a la que pertenece el editor.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the editor category.
trans-unit.target: Valor de tipo <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa la categor√≠a del editor.

trans-unit.source: Category editors are defined on types and, thus, at load time they need to indicate to which category they belong.
trans-unit.target: Los editores de categor√≠as se definen en los tipos y, por lo tanto, en el momento de la carga deben indicar a qu√© categor√≠a pertenecen.
